promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a young simple swan normal-type with a ornate tail. It can be found in village-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or swan. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cygnet, a young simple swan normal-type pokemon. It can be found in village-like environments It has the following abilities: false-swipe, fury-attack. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word swan or normal or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, swan-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, bright lighting
generatedDescription: Cygnet is a village-dweller, a playful pokemon that loves a good challenge. Its skillful false-swipe and fury-attack sure surprise opponents!
